properties.deliveryDays: Estimated delivery time in business days (Group: Delivery)
properties.minDeliveryDays: Minimal estimated delivery time in business days (Group: Delivery)
properties.maxDeliveryDays: Maximal estimated delivery time in business days (Group: Delivery)
properties.minQuantity: Option available if quantity is greater than X
properties.maxQuantity: Option available if quantity is lower than X
properties.provided: Provided other options to enable this option
